code: import React from"react";import{getFileList}from"../services/getFileList";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FileList=_ref=>{let{userName,files,fileList,getFileListStatus,setGetFileListStatus,setFiles}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-2",children:["Get Files",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>getFileList(userName,files,setGetFileListStatus,setFiles),className:"btn btn-secondary",style:{margin:"0 10px",fontSize:"1rem"},children:"Get File List"}),getFileListStatus==="success"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"File List:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:fileList.map((file,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:file.name},index))})]}),getFileListStatus==="fail"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-danger mt-2",children:"\u274C Failed to get file list!"})]});};export default FileList;
